word:
Women of Sharp Intellect Needed to Manage Business
     FOLLOWING IS A PORTION OF A LETTER WRITTEN IN FEBRUARY 1884 TO THE MATRON OF THE ST. HELENA HEALTH RETREAT.  MRS. WHITE PLEADS WITH THIS WOMAN TO MAKE A DECIDED IMPACT ON THE WORK OF GOD, TO TRAIN YOUNG WOMEN TO BE USEFUL, AND TO USE HER OWN TALENTS TO HER BEST ABILITY.
